Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix app exiting after idle by refreshing keyboard hooks

Windows silently kills low-level keyboard hooks after sleep/wake or
extended idle, causing keyboard.wait\("esc"\) to return and the app to
exit. Replace with a periodic hook re-registration loop that survives
these events.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
